SELECT A.INOUT_ID, A.INOUT_TIME, A.SOURCE_DOC_TYPE, B.ITEM_CODE, B.ITEM_NAME, B.ITEM_TYPE, CASE WHEN A.SOURCE_DOC_TYPE = 41 THEN C.PURCHASE_CODE WHEN A.SOURCE_DOC_TYPE = 43 THEN D.PLAN_ID END AS DOC_NO, CASE WHEN A.INOUT_TYPE = 23 THEN C.PURCHASE_DATE WHEN A.INOUT_TYPE = 22 THEN D.COMPLETION_DATE END AS DOC_DATE, A.QUANTITY, E.WH_CODE, E.WH_NAME, F.EMP_NO, F.EMP_NAME FROM INOUT A JOIN ITEM B ON A.ITEM_ID = B.ITEM_ID LEFT JOIN PURCHASE_HEADER C ON A.SOURCE_DOC_HEADER_ID = C.PURCHASE_ID AND A.SOURCE_DOC_TYPE = 41 LEFT JOIN PRODUCTION_PLAN D ON TO_CHAR(A.SOURCE_DOC_HEADER_ID) = D.PLAN_ID AND A.SOURCE_DOC_TYPE = 43 JOIN WAREHOUSE E ON A.WH_ID = E.WH_ID JOIN EMPLOYEE F ON A.EMP_ID = F.EMP_ID
A.INOUT_TYPE IN (22, 23)
AND A.SOURCE_DOC_TYPE = #{sourceDocType}
AND A.INOUT_ID LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
AND (TO_CHAR(A.INOUT_TIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD') LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR TO_CHAR(A.INOUT_TIME, 'YYYYMMDD') LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%')
AND B.ITEM_CODE LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
AND B.ITEM_NAME LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
AND (C.PURCHASE_CODE LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR D.PLAN_ID LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%')
AND ( TO_CHAR(C.PURCHASE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR TO_CHAR(C.PURCHASE_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD') LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR TO_CHAR(D.COMPLETION_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR TO_CHAR(D.COMPLETION_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD') LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' )
AND E.WH_CODE LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
AND E.WH_NAME LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
AND F.EMP_NO LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
AND F.EMP_NAME LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
ORDER BY A.INOUT_ID DESC

SELECT A.INOUT_ID, A.INOUT_TIME, A.SOURCE_DOC_TYPE, B.ITEM_CODE, B.ITEM_NAME, B.ITEM_TYPE, B.SPEC, C.CODE, B.PRICE,
D.PURCHASE_CODE AS DOC_NO, D.PURCHASE_DATE AS DOC_DATE, E.ORDER_QTY AS DOC_QTY, E.ORDER_QTY * E.UNIT_PRICE AS DOC_COST,
F.PLAN_ID AS DOC_NO, F.COMPLETION_DATE AS DOC_DATE, F.ACTUAL_QTY AS DOC_QTY, F.ACTUAL_QTY * B.PRICE AS DOC_COST,
A.QUANTITY, A.QUANTITY * A.ITEM_UNIT_COST AS IN_COST, G.WH_CODE, G.WH_NAME, H.EMP_NO, H.EMP_NAME, H.HP, A.REMARK
FROM INOUT A JOIN ITEM B ON A.ITEM_ID = B.ITEM_ID JOIN COMMON_CODE C ON B.UNIT_CODE = C.CODE_ID
JOIN PURCHASE_HEADER D ON A.SOURCE_DOC_HEADER_ID = D.PURCHASE_ID JOIN PURCHASE_DETAIL E ON D.PURCHASE_ID = E.PURCHASE_ID AND A.SOURCE_DOC_DETAIL_ID = E.PURCHASE_DETAIL_ID
JOIN PRODUCTION_PLAN F ON TO_CHAR(A.SOURCE_DOC_HEADER_ID) = F.PLAN_ID
JOIN WAREHOUSE G ON A.WH_ID = G.WH_ID JOIN EMPLOYEE H ON A.EMP_ID = H.EMP_ID WHERE A.INOUT_ID = #{inoutId} AND A.SOURCE_DOC_TYPE = #{sourceDocType}

SELECT A.INOUT_ID, A.INOUT_TIME, A.SOURCE_DOC_TYPE, A.SOURCE_DOC_HEADER_ID, A.SOURCE_DOC_DETAIL_ID, B.ITEM_ID, B.ITEM_CODE, B.ITEM_NAME, B.ITEM_TYPE, B.SPEC, C.CODE, B.PRICE,
D.PURCHASE_CODE AS DOC_NO, TO_CHAR(D.PURCHASE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS DOC_DATE, E.ORDER_QTY AS DOC_QTY, E.ORDER_QTY * E.UNIT_PRICE AS DOC_COST,
F.PLAN_ID AS DOC_NO, TO_CHAR(F.COMPLETION_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS DOC_DATE, F.ACTUAL_QTY AS DOC_QTY, F.ACTUAL_QTY * B.PRICE AS DOC_COST,
A.QUANTITY AS QTY, A.ITEM_UNIT_COST
FROM INOUT A JOIN ITEM B ON A.ITEM_ID = B.ITEM_ID JOIN COMMON_CODE C ON B.UNIT_CODE = C.CODE_ID
JOIN PURCHASE_HEADER D ON A.SOURCE_DOC_HEADER_ID = D.PURCHASE_ID JOIN PURCHASE_DETAIL E ON D.PURCHASE_ID = E.PURCHASE_ID AND A.SOURCE_DOC_DETAIL_ID = E.PURCHASE_DETAIL_ID
JOIN PRODUCTION_PLAN F ON TO_CHAR(A.SOURCE_DOC_HEADER_ID) = F.PLAN_ID
A.INOUT_TYPE = 21
AND TO_CHAR(D.PURCHASE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') LIKE '%' || #{docDate} || '%'
AND TO_CHAR(F.COMPLETION_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') LIKE '%' || #{docDate} || '%'
SELECT WH_ID, WH_CODE, WH_NAME, ADDRESS, ADDRESS_DETAIL FROM WAREHOUSE WHERE WH_NAME LIKE '%' || #{whName} || '%'
SELECT EMP_ID, EMP_NO, EMP_NAME, HP FROM EMPLOYEE WHERE EMP_NAME LIKE '%' || #{empName} || '%'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM INOUT WHERE SOURCE_DOC_TYPE = #{sourceDocType} AND SOURCE_DOC_HEADER_ID = #{sourceDocHeaderId} AND ITEM_ID = #{itemId} AND INOUT_TYPE IN (22,23)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO INOUT(INOUT_TIME, INOUT_TYPE, ITEM_ID, WH_ID, QUANTITY, ITEM_UNIT_COST, SOURCE_DOC_TYPE, SOURCE_DOC_HEADER_ID, SOURCE_DOC_DETAIL_ID, EMP_ID, REMARK, CREATED_AT) VALUES (SYSDATE, #{inoutType}, #{itemId}, #{whId}, #{quantity}, #{itemUnitCost}, #{sourceDocType}, #{sourceDocHeaderId}, #{sourceDocDetailId}, #{empId}, #{remark}, SYSDATE)
